gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 110, Nets 99
gameRecap.excerpt: Charlotte defeats Brooklyn, 110-99. For Charlotte, Miles Bridges led the way with 24 points and 10 rebounds while aided by Brandon Miller (23 points, seven rebounds, three assists) and Nick Richards (15 points, 11 rebounds) in the victory. Cam Thomas finished with 31 points (five 3PM) with Mikal Bridges recording 19 points (four 3PM) and four assists and Nic Claxton tallying 14 points, 10 rebounds, and two blocks for Brooklyn in the losing effort. Charlotte improves to 16-48 on the season, while Brooklyn moves to 25-39 with the loss.
